# Project Badges

This file contains various badges that can be used in the project README and documentation.

## Build Status

```markdown
[![Build Status](https://github.com/go-tribe/gotribe-admin/workflows/CI/badge.svg)](https://github.com/go-tribe/gotribe-admin/actions)
[![Go Report Card](https://goreportcard.com/badge/github.com/go-tribe/gotribe-admin)](https://goreportcard.com/report/github.com/go-tribe/gotribe-admin)
[![GoDoc](https://godoc.org/github.com/go-tribe/gotribe-admin?status.svg)](https://godoc.org/github.com/go-tribe/gotribe-admin)
```
